definitions: Bends something over on itself so that one part of it covers another.
Closes or collapses something by bending it over on itself.
Wraps something in a flexible material.
Gives way under pressure or strain.
Ceases to operate or do business.
In card games, withdraws from the current round.
examples: The chair folds for easy storage.
He folds his arms across his chest.
The company folds after years of losses.
The bridge folds under the weight.
